div.hi: University of Edinburgh Exam Papers Online: 2004/05 to 2018/19
To find a paper, use the search box above or select a school from the list on the right:
div.p: The very latest papers added are from the 2018-19 diet. These pages will be updated periodically, as more papers become available. If you cannot find the paper you are looking for, please email exam.papers@ed.ac.uk, or try visiting again at a later date.

hi.alt: tips on how to search for a past paper

list.item: Typing in the course name or code will bring up suggestions for records already in the database.
If you cannot find the paper you are looking for from a title search try entering the course code. Course codes changed format in 2010/11 so results will be different before and after this time.
You can browse to the paper you are looking for by clicking the options on the right-hand side of the screen to narrow the results by School, subject, year and title.

div.p: The Library does not hold any marking guides or sample solutions to exam papers. We suggest that you contact the course secretary or course organiser to check if these have been created for your course and how they have been made available.
Frequently asked questions for students, and administrative and teaching staff can be found at the FAQs Page.

hi.alt: information on requesting exam papers in alternative formats

div.p:
If you require an exam paper in an alternative format, such as large print or a coloured background, please contact the Exam Papers Online Team, by e-mail at
exam.papers@ed.ac.uk, or by phone on 0131 651 1827.
